1365:2: na sanna cāsanna tathā na cānyathā na jāyate vyeti na cā[nā]vahīyate|
1365:3: na vardhate nāpi viśudhyate punarviśudhyate tatparamārthalakṣaṇam||1||
1365:11: na hīyate na ca vardhate saṃkleśavyavadānapakṣayornirodhotpāde tad[thā]vasthatvāt|
1365:12: na viśudhyati prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭatvāt na ca na viśudhyati āgantukopakleśavigamāt|
1365:15: na cātmadṛṣṭiḥ svayamātmalakṣaṇā na cāpi duḥsaṃsthitatā vilakṣaṇā|
1365:16: dvayānna cānyad bhrama eṣata[tū]ditastataśca mokṣo bhramamātrasaṃkṣayaḥ||2||
1365:23: bhrama eṣa tūtpanno yeyamātmadṛṣṭistasmādeva cātmābhāvonmokṣo'pi bhramamātrasaṃkṣayo veditavyaḥ,
1365:26: kathaṃ jano vibhramamātrāmāśritaḥ paraiti duḥkhaprakṛtiṃ na saṃtatām|
1365:27: avedako vedaka eva duḥkhito na duḥkhito dharmamayo na tanmayaḥ||3||
1365:30: kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ loko bhrāntimātramātmadarśanaṃ niḥśritya satatānubaddhaṃ duḥkhasvabhāvaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ na paśyati|
1365:36: yadā ca loko bhāvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyakṣaṃ paśyati taṃ taṃ pratyayaṃ pratītya te te bhāvā bhavantīti|
1365:37: tatkathametāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śrayate 'nyakāritaṃ darśanādikaṃ na pratītyasamutpannamiti|
1365:39: śakyaṃ hi nāma tamasā vidyamānamadraṣṭuṃ syānna tvavidyamānaṃ draṣṭhumiti|
1365:41: ta cāntaraṃ kiṃcana vidyate 'nayoḥ sadarthavṛttyā śamajanmanoriha|
1365:42: tathāpi janmakṣayato vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubhakarmakāriṇām||5||
1365:43: na cāsti saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ kiṃcinnānākaraṇaṃ paramārthavṛttyā nairātmyasya samatayā|
1365:44: tathāpi janmakṣayānmokṣaprāptirbhavatyeva śubhakarmakāriṇāṃ ye mokṣamārgaṃ bhāvayanti|
1365:47: saṃbhṛtya saṃbhāramanantapāraṃ jñānasya puṇyasya ca bodhisattvaḥ|
1365:49: arthānsa vijñāya ca jalpamātrān saṃtiṣṭhate tannibhacittamātre|
1365:59: ekena saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāratvaṃ dharmacintāsuviniśri[ści]tatvaṃ samādhi[dhiṃ]niśrityabhāvanānmanojalpācca teṣāṃ dharmāṇāmarthaprakhyānāvagamāttatpraveśaṃ darśayati|
1365:61: dvitīyena manojalpamātrānarthānviditvā tadābhāse cittamātre'vasthānamiyaṃ bodhisattvasya nirvedhabhāgīyāvasthā|
1365:65: tṛtīyena yathāsau dharmadhātuḥ pratyakṣatāmeti tad darśayati|
1365:67: cittādanyadālambanaṃ grāhyaṃ nāstītyavagamya buddhyā tasyāpi cittamātrasya nāstitvāvagamanaṃ grāhya[ā]bhāve grāhakābhāvāt|
1365:69: ] nāstitvaṃ viditvā dharmadhātāvavasthānamatadgatirgrāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇābhyāṃ rahitaṃ evaṃ dharmadhātuḥ pratyakṣatāmeti|
1365:71: sadā sarvatra samatānugatenāvikalpajñānabalena yatra tatsamatānugataṃ paratantre svabhāve tadāśrayasya dūrānupraviṣṭasya doṣasaṃcasya dauṣṭhulyalakṣaṇasya mahāgadeneva viṣasya nirasanāt|
1365:75: buddhavihite sudharme suvyavasthāpite sa paramārthajñānapraviṣṭo bodhisattvaḥ saṃpiṇḍitadharmālambanasya mūlacittasya dharmadhātau matimupanividhāya yā smṛtirūpalabhyate tāṃ sarvāṃ smṛtipravṛttiṃ kalpanāmātrāmavagacchatyevaṃ guṇārṇavasya pāraṃbuddhatvamāśu vrajatītyetatparamārthajñānasya māhātmyam|
